heading: # Simple tables
headingText: The `v-simple-table` component is a simple wrapper component around the `<table>` element. Inside the component you can use all the regular table elements such as `<thead>`, `<tbody>`, `<tr>`, etc.

usage.desc: The simple table is a wrapper component around the `<table>` element.

height.heading: ### Fixed height
height.desc: Use the `height` prop to set the height of the table.

fixed-header.heading: ### Fixed header
fixed-header.desc: Use the `fixed-header` prop together with the `height` prop to fix the header to the top of the table.

dense.heading: ### Dense table
dense.desc: You can show a dense version of the table by using the `dense` prop.

dark.heading: ### Dark theme
dark.desc: Use `dark` prop to switch table to the dark theme.

v-simple-table.dense: Decreases paddings to render a dense table
v-simple-table.fixedHeader: Sets table header to fixed mode
